name: Viking Escapades
description:
Viking Escapades is an one level demo for 4 player co-operation.

Core of the game is in the never seen before true co-operation. Together you shall win or together you will fall. Every one is needed to overcome the challenges of the treacherous new found land. Each weapon gives different skill and every skills are needed in different game phases. Players need a lot of communication as changing weapons and skills are needed in the middle of action.

The game takes a new perspective to mighty Viking warriors. In this fast spaced action game players take a role of misfit vikings who gain powers of old norse gods from magical weapons. With their newfound powers they begin to do what Vikings do best: raiding treasures from tribes faraway lands.
